summary: ↳ renly week 2018 + day one: childhood imaginary friends: a playlist for renly’s childhood. featuring instrumental tracks,...
caption:
↳ renly week 2018 + day one: childhood

imaginary friends: a playlist for renly’s childhood. featuring instrumental tracks, mainly from movie soundtracks including harry potter, lord of the rings, star wars, etc. because, as if the idea of renly’s childhood in canon wasn’t sad enough, i think it’d be exactly the same in a modern au and thus all of his friends would come from his favourite book and movie franchises because there aren’t any other kids to play with in storm’s end.

title: '#GameOfThrones' hosts reunion for cast members
excerpt: 'Game of Thrones' is hosting a reunion for all the cast members that have been a part of the franchise till date. But if you are a 'GOT' fan, don't get your hopes high, because the reunion won't air on HBO.

summary: the single most annoying thing about a clash of kings is the amount of tyrion's pov chapters and the sparsity of sansa's,...
body:
the single most annoying thing about a clash of kings is the amount of tyrion’s pov chapters and the sparsity of sansa’s, arya’s, dany’s, cat’s, jon’s, well basically everyone else’s

it’s getting real boring real quick.

i mean i can’t even skip the chapters since i could miss something important but i just can’t fucking stand the fact that like every other fucking chapter is tyrion’s argh

summary: J.K. Rowling Roasts Sarah Huckabee Sanders With George Orwell ‘1984’ Quote
title: J.K. Rowling Roasts Sarah Huckabee Sanders With George Orwell ‘1984’ Quote
body:
J.K. Rowling went full 1984 to bash White House press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders and President Donald Trump’s administration on Thursday.

The Harry Potter author tweeted a sentence from George Orwell’s classic dystopian novel after Sanders circulated a doctored video that she falsely claimed showed CNN reporter Jim Acosta manhandling an intern during a fiery press conference exchange with Trump.

“And if all others accepted the lie which the Party imposed—if all records told the same tale—then the lie passed into history and became truth,” Rowling wrote, referencing Orwell’s tale about a society controlled by a lurking totalitarian dictator.

Many Rowling fans agreed with her analysis:

RELATED COVERAGE

  • Don Lemon: Trump’s Press Conference ‘Temper Tantrum’ Means 1 Thing
  • Trump’s Old Promise To Not Ban Reporters Comes Back To Haunt Him
  • Mark Hamill Turns Trump’s 'Game Of Thrones’ Meme Against Him

Download

Read more: http://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/jk-rowling-sarah-huckabee-sanders-george-orwell_us_5be55017e4b0e843889648d8

The post J.K. Rowling Roasts Sarah Huckabee Sanders With George Orwell ‘1984’ Quote appeared first on Viral TV News.



from WordPress http://www.viraltvnews.com/game_of_thrones/j-k-rowling-roasts-sarah-huckabee-sanders-with-george-orwell-1984-quote/

summary: There's a man who lies to comfort others, because as a child lies were his only comfort. A siege is no place for a little boy. ...
body:
let the summer storm clear the sky when you cry

There’s a man who lies to comfort others, because as a child lies were his only comfort. A siege is no place for a little boy.

  • rating: T // 2952 words // creator chose not to use archive warnings // characters: renly baratheon, stannis baratheon, cortnay penrose, loras tyrell // tw for implied animal death and implied cannibalism

@rainbowguardassemble

summary: Video by ScreenCrush This video give a quick explanation on how Jon’s and Daenerys’ journey directly parallel and mirror each...
caption:
Video by ScreenCrush

This video give a quick explanation on how Jon’s and Daenerys’ journey directly parallel and mirror each other, showing some of the main reasons as to why their relationship is one aspect of asoiaf - with Jon representing “ice” and Dany representing “fire”.
